page.title: 05Airships Today
page.content: The Airship 600s now being built have two Porsche Turbo engines which give it a top speed of about 60 knots. Unlike the very large rigid airships like the R101, the modern ones cannot fly long distances in one go. When they are sold to another country like the U.S.A. Japan or Australia the balloon is packed in a large crate and sent by sea. Airships are now being used for advertising. There are points where the signs can be strapped to the side of the balloon. They are also used for a television camera platform, to survey remote wild areas, or to watch over fishing fleets at sea. They could also be valuable for military needs as they do not show up on radar. If you would like one they cost about{Â£6 million pounds} delivered to your door.
